pages.text: Ngwalumbila awala (Achimalaika) waakwima m’miselamisela (pakuswali)
Kwisa soni awala (Achimalaika) waakasakalipilaga mwamachili (kugakalipila mawunde gawula pakugajendesya)
Kwisa soni awala (Achimalaika) waakusoomaga chikumbusyo (chitabu pakwikanacho kwa Achimitume kuumila kwa Allah)
Chisimu Nnungu jwenu ni Jumpepe
M’mbuje jwa kumawunde ni petaka ni yaili chilikati chakwe, soni M’mbuje jwa kungopoko kosope
Chisimu Uwwe tulisalalisye liwunde lya duniya ni isalalisyo yandondwa
Ni kuligosa ku shetani jwalijose jwakunyosya
Kuti akapikanila ya nkutula wa kwinani (wa Achimalaika), ni akasasomedwaga (ni yenje yandondwa) kuumila upande wa mbali ni mbali
Kuwinjidwa mwamachili, soni akwete kupata wanganyao ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope ni kwendelechela
Ikaweje jwasombwele lilowe mwawiyi, basi ni kunkuya chenje chakuwala nnope

Basi mwawusyani (achimakafilio kuti): “Ana wanganyao ni wali wakusausya nnope kagumbidwe, kapena ayila (ine mpela mawunde, mataka ni matumbi) yatwaigumbile?” Chisimu Uwwe twagumbile jamanjao kuumila mwilongo lyakunyata
(Ngwamba), nambo mmwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) nkusimonga (kanila kwao yakwimuka m’malembe), sano wanganyao ni akutenda chipongwe (kuntenda mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ ni Qur’an)
Soni naga ali akumbusyidwe wangakumbuchila
Soni naga ali achiweni chisimosimo akasachitenda chipongwe
Ni akasatiji: “Nganichiwatu achi ikaweje usawi wakuonechela.”
“Ana patuchiwapo ni kusyuka uwwejo litaka ni maupa, nambo yakuona kuti uwwe tuchiukulidwa (m’malembe)?”
“Mpaka ni achatati wetu wandanda (nombenao tachiukulidwa)?”
Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Elo (tinchiukulidwa), soni jenumanja n’di wakunyosyeka.”
Basi chisimu kwalakwe (kuukulidwako) kuchiwa ni n’gumilo umpepe (walipenga lyawili), basi papopo wanganyao tachiwa ali nkulola
Ni tachiti: “Ipotesi yetuwe! Ali ni Lisiku Lyamalipilo.”
(Tachisalilidwa yanti): “Ali ni Lisiku Lyachiilanyo alila lyamwaliji jenumanja n’di nkulikanila.”
(Achimalaika tachisalilidwa yanti): “Mwasonganganyani awala wawalitesile lupuso, pamo ni achimijao (wachijini), kwisa soni (isanamu) ayila yawaliji nkuigalagatila.”
“Kunneka Allah; basi mwajongolelani kwitala lya ku Moto Waukali.”
“Soni mwajimikani, chisimu wanganyao ali wakuwusyidwa.”
